Title: The Commitments
Writer: Roddy Doyle (novel), Dick Clement (screenplay), Ian La Frenais (screenplay), Roddy Doyle (screenplay)
Actors: Robert Arkins, Michael Aherne, Angeline Ball, Maria Doyle Kennedy
Plot: Jimmy Rabbitte, an unemployed Dublin boy, decides to put together a soul band made up entirely of the Irish working class.
Awards: Nominated for 1 Oscar. Another 11 wins & 12 nominations.
